descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 20 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description: Step into the mesmerizing world of Ninja Academy, where you'll immerse yourself in the ancient art of ninjutsu. Set in a stunning landscape inspired by feudal Japan, you'll train as a ninja apprentice, mastering stealth, agility, and combat. Traverse serene gardens and treacherous mountain passes as you face challenging trials and missions, from intricate obstacle courses to intense battles with rival ninjas. With intuitive VR controls, execute acrobatic maneuvers and unleash devastating combos with precision. Utilize authentic ninja weapons like throwing stars and using your katana to outmaneuver foes and overcome obstacles. Only by harnessing your inner strength and unlocking the secrets of the ninjas you can emerge victorious. With stunning visuals, dynamic gameplay, and an epic storyline, Ninja Academy offers an unparalleled VR experience. Begin your journey to mastery today and become the ultimate ninja!
